bibl.title: Three unpublished von Scherling texts in the McGill University Library
bibl.note: 1. MUL MS Greek 20. Ptolemaic Tax Receipt. Thebes, 22 July 98 BCE. - 2. MUL MS Greek 17 [formerly: P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 2008]. Fragment of a Letter (?). Provenance unknown, IV CE. - 3. MUL MS Greek 19. Mummy Label. Panopolitan nome, II-IV CE.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Montreal MacGill Univ. Inv. MS Greek 17 142.4 O. Montreal MacGill Univ. Inv. MS Greek 20 143.4 T. Montreal MacGill Univ. Inv. MS Greek 19
Brice C. Jones, Three Unpublished von Scherling Texts in the McGill University Library.

1. MUL MS Greek 20. Ptolemaic Tax Receipt. Thebes, 22 July 98 BCE. - 2. MUL MS Greek 17 [formerly: P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 2008]. Fragment of a Letter (?). Provenance unknown, IV CE. - 3. MUL MS Greek 19. Mummy Label. Panopolitan nome, II-IV CE.
